ygData.subject: Heritrix 1.6.0 release candidate now available
ygData.msgSnippet: The latest build of Heritrix (build.826/20051123210311) has been designated a public release candidate for Heritrix 1.6.0. It s available via our build box,

Subject: Heritrix 1.6.0 release candidate now available
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=137285340; y=hj3oru3O8tck7D8Let5oByltKcSoMUaF5NjJhCwQsBh4
X-Yahoo-Profile: gojomo

The latest build of Heritrix (build.826/20051123210311)
has been designated a public release candidate for
Heritrix 1.6.0.

It's available via our build box, specifically at:

   http://crawltools.archive.org:8080/cruisecontrol/artifacts/HEAD-heritrix/20051123210311

We would especially appreciate any feedback or bug reports
over the next week. If all continues to go well with
internal and external testing, this code will become the
official 1.6.0 release some time next week.

Only critical bug fixes and improved documentation are
eligible to be committed to CVS HEAD between now and then.

A list of bugs fixed and enhancements implemented can be
found in the preliminary Release Notes:

   http://crawler.archive.org/articles/releasenotes.html#1_6_0_changes

- Gordon @ IA
